package.name: related_product_slider
package.summary: This is related product slider extension for magento latest version 1.9
package.description:
This is a related product slider extension for magento latest version 1.9
This Extension works on the product page.
Its user friendly and easy to install and configure.
If you want to display no of related products on product page then its hard to manage so put this slider and display unlimited products.
its give smoothly sliding effect to product thumbnail images.
This is continuous scrolling slider.
JQuery no conflict added to avoid conflicts with other scripts.
Compatible with all modern browser.
Lightweight, modern and fast loading slider design.
User can easily install and customize CSS and HTML formatting.
package.notes: This is stable version of related product slider extension
